source.code:
import { Button } from '@persona-framework/ui' import { Code, Terminal, GitBranch, Search, Bot, Cloud } from 'lucide-react' interface HomePageProps { onGetStarted: () => void } export function HomePage({ onGetStarted }: HomePageProps) { const scrollToFeatures = () => { const featuresSection = document.getElementById('features-section') if (featuresSection) { featuresSection.scrollIntoView({ behavior: 'smooth', block: 'start' }) } } return (
WRAITH
Browser IDE

Code Anywhere, Anytime

A powerful browser-based IDE built on Monaco Editor with AI assistance, integrated terminal, Git support, and real-time collaboration. Develop full-stack applications without leaving your browser.

Monaco Editor

The same powerful code editor that powers VS Code. IntelliSense, syntax highlighting, multi-cursor editing, and 100+ programming languages supported.

Integrated Terminal

Full-featured terminal with xterm.js. Run commands, scripts, and build processes directly in your browser with split terminal support.

Git Integration

Built-in Git support with visual diff viewer, branch management, commit history, and seamless GitHub/GitLab integration.

Advanced Search

Powerful search and replace across your entire project. Regular expressions, case-sensitive matching, and file type filtering.

AI Code Assistant

Built-in AI assistant powered by Persona Framework. Get code suggestions, refactoring help, and documentation generation.

Cloud Storage

Automatic project syncing with cloud storage. Access your code from any device, collaborate in real-time with your team.

Professional Development Environment 

{`// Welcome to Wraith - Browser IDE
import { createPersona } from '@persona-framework/core'

const assistant = createPersona({
  name: 'CodeHelper',
  model: 'claude-3.5-sonnet',
  capabilities: ['code-generation', 'debugging', 'documentation']
})

// AI-powered code assistance in your browser
const result = await assistant.chat('Optimize this function')
console.log(result)
`}

Powered by Persona Framework Â© 2025 Daemoniorum, Inc.

) }
